azurerm_automation_job_schedule.description: Links an Automation Runbook and Schedule.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group in which the Job Schedule is created. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

automation_account_name.description: The name of the Automation Account in which the Job Schedule is created. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

runbook_name.description: The name of a Runbook to link to a Schedule. It needs to be in the same Automation Account as the Schedule and Job Schedule. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

parameters.description: A map of key/value pairs corresponding to the arguments that can be passed to the Runbook. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.
notes: The parameter keys/names must strictly be in lowercase, even if this is not the case in the runbook. This is due to a limitation in Azure Automation where the parameter names are normalized. The values specified don't have this limitation.

run_on.description: Name of a Hybrid Worker Group the Runbook will be executed on. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

id.description: The ID of the Automation Job Schedule.

job_schedule_id.description: The UUID identifying the Automation Job Schedule.

create.description: Used when creating the Automation Job Schedule.

update.description: Used when updating the Automation Job Schedule.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Automation Job Schedule.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Automation Job Schedule.
